tweet: Fun fact: Every Bitcoin developer also works on Litecoin. Absolutely nothing they can do about that! 😀  If you don't like that Litecoin piggybacks off of Bitcoin developers' hard work, it is because you care more about Bitcoin making you rich than crypto changing the world. 🤔  https://t.co/WSwss7aFWl

I created about 1000 sockpuppet accounts today and put [LTC] on their names to try to make it seem like Litecoin is popular. Now, I'm going to log in to those accounts to like this, retweet this, and laugh at my own joke. You just watch... 😛  https://t.co/GEgUbL1IDr
